title: YT Blaze models get lit with RockShox Ultimate suspension for Izzo, Jeffsy & Capra
content:
YT Industries have reinvigorated their line of full suspension mountain bikes with RockShox Ultimate suspension upgrades for the Izzo, Jeffsy and Capra 29ers. The new YT Blaze models are limited edition runs; 500 Izzo Blaze models are available worldwide while there will only be 300 Jeffsy Blaze and Capra Blaze bikes to go around.Â  YT […]

The post YT Blaze models get lit with RockShox Ultimate suspension for Izzo, Jeffsy & Capra appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
